t.t-if: record.room_type_id.display_name == roomData.room_type && (recordDate(record.check_in_date) == recordCalendarDate(day.date) || (recordCalendarDate(day.date) >= recordDate(record.check_in_date) && (recordDate(record.check_out_date) > recordCalendarDate(day.date)))) && record.status == 'done'

record.room_type_id.display_name == roomData.room_type && (recordDate(record.check_in_date) == recordCalendarDate(day.date) || (recordCalendarDate(day.date) >= recordDate(record.check_in_date) && (recordDate(record.check_out_date) > recordCalendarDate(day.date)))) && record.status == 'done'

table.t-attf-class: o_list_table table table-sm table-hover position-relative mb-0 {{props.list.isGrouped ? 'o_list_table_grouped' : 'o_list_table_ungrouped table-striped'}}

span.class: o_resize position-absolute top-0 end-0 bottom-0 ps-1 bg-black-25 opacity-0 opacity-50-hover z-index-1

div.p: The date and time of check-in or check-out has come but the guest hasn't checked in or checked out yet
The guest stayed in different rooms
This booking has not been fully paid. You can check guests out after you confirm the payment
